name: .CHITUBOX File Extension
summary: Learn about .CHITUBOX files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a CHITUBOX file with Chitubox. To do so:
Select the program's sandwich menu (in the upper-left corner).
Navigate to and open your CHITUBOX file.
You can use Chitubox to convert the 3D models a CHITUBOX file contains to the following formats:
Open your CHITUBOX file in Chitubox.
Choose All Models or Selected Model.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

images.alt: Screenshot of a .chitubox file in Chitubox
